src:
ZVEZDA, ENGLEZI I MAGIČNI NOVEMBAR: Totenhem kao repriza Liverpula? Što da ne!
06 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Zile

Crvena zvezda dočekuje Totenhem u četvrtom kolu grupne faze Lige šampiona, u sredu u 21 čas, na stadionu „Rajko Mitić“ koji će verovatno biti prepun.

Posle tri kola, šampion Srbije u igri je za drugi krug. Bajern je prvi sa maksimalnim učinkom i devet bodova, Totenhem drugi s četiri, Zvezda ima tri, a Olimpijakos bod.
Na papiru, “pevci” su favoriti. Ako verujete u novi podvig čete Vladana Milojevića, u Meridian kladionici pobedu crveno-belih možete naplatiti po kvoti od čak 5.15!
Zašto da ne, istog dana prošle godine, 6. novembra, u Beogradu je pao i Liverpul… Možda opet bude 2:0? Ako vam se to „javlja“, Meridian nudi sjajnu kvotu 5.75!
Milan Pavkov tada je zatresao mrežu Liverpula posle prekida, glavom. Ukoliko smatrate da je trenutak za reprizu gola glavom bilo kog igrača Zvezde – kvota je okruglo pet!

Ako to učini Pavkov, naplatićete po kvoti 12!

„Alfa i omega“ Zvezde je Marko Marin. Kad je on u pitanju, Meridian ima sjajnu ponudu za vas – gol i asistencija kapitena po kvoti 25!

Ostale više nego zanimljive igre za utakmicu Crvena zvezda – Totenhem možete pronaći u Meridian specijalu na sajtu Meridianbet!

Pod upitnikom za gostujući tim su Hari Kejn i Hjeon-Min Son, ali I bez njih u pitanju je sjajn tim koji nikako ne sme biti potcenjen.

Zvezda nema šta da izgubi, a nema sumnje da nas u Beogradu u sredu uveče očekuje još jedno magično fudbalsko veče.


POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
STAR, ENGLISH AND MAGIC NOVEMBER: Tottenham as a reprise of Liverpool? Why not!
06 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Zile

Red Star welcomes Tottenham Hotspur in the fourth round of the Champions League group stage, at 9pm on Wednesday, at the Rajko Mitic Stadium, which is likely to be crowded.

After three rounds, the Serbian champion is in the game for the second round. Bayern are first with maximum impact and nine points, Tottenham second with four, Star have three, and Olympiakos point.
On paper, "singers" are favorites. If you believe in the new feat of Vladan Milojevic's company, at Meridian Bookmaker you can claim a win of the red and white at a quota of as much as 5.15!
Why not, on the same day last year, November 6th, Liverpool fell in Belgrade ... Maybe it will be 2-0 again? If you get the hang of it, Meridian offers a great odds of 5.75!
Milan Pavkov then shook the Liverpool net after a break, with his head. If you feel that the moment to replay is the bare head of any Star player - the odd is round five!

If Pavkov does, you will be charged at odds 12!

The star's "Alpha and Omega" is Marko Marin. When it comes to Meridian, there is a great deal for you - a goal and an assist from the captain at 25!

You can find more interesting games for the match Red Star vs Tottenham in Meridian special on the Meridianbet website!

The visiting team questionnaire includes Harry Kane and Hyeon-Min Son, but without them, it's a great team that should never be underestimated.

The star has nothing to lose, and there is no doubt that another magical football night awaits us in Belgrade on Wednesday night.
